data.title: Cursor - The AI Code Editor
data.description: Built to make you extraordinarily productive, Cursor is the best way to code with AI.
data.content:
Cursor - The AI Code Editor
===============

[![Image 1](https://www.cursor.com/assets/videos/logo/placeholder-logo.webp)](https://www.cursor.com/)

*   [Pricing](https://www.cursor.com/pricing)
*   [Features](https://www.cursor.com/features)
*   [Enterprise](https://www.cursor.com/enterprise)
*   [Blog](https://www.cursor.com/blog)
*   [Forum](https://forum.cursor.com/)
*   [Careers](https://anysphere.inc/)

[Sign in](https://www.cursor.com/api/auth/login) Download

![Image 2](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fgradient-hero-prerender.3af0e196.webp&w=3840&q=75)

The AI  
Code Editor
====================

Built to make you extraordinarily productive, Cursor is the best way to code with AI.

Download for Linux[All Downloads](https://www.cursor.com/downloads)

![Image 3](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fwatch-demo.7a9056ad.webp&w=3840&q=100)

Trusted by engineers at

Tab, tab, tab
-------------

Cursor lets you breeze through changes by predicting your next edit.

![Image 4](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbg-compress.28e9667b.webp&w=3840&q=75)

Knows your codebase
-------------------

Get answers from your codebase or refer to files or docs. Use the model‚Äôs code in one click.

![Image 5](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbg-compress.28e9667b.webp&w=3840&q=75)

Edit in natural language
------------------------

Cursor lets you write code using instructions. Update entire classes or functions with a simple prompt.

![Image 6](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbg-compress.28e9667b.webp&w=3840&q=75)

Build software faster
---------------------

Intelligent, fast, and familiar, Cursor is the best way to code with AI.

[See more features](https://www.cursor.com/features)

*   [### Frontier Intelligence Powered by a mix of purpose-built and frontier models, Cursor is smart and fast. ![Image 7](https://assets.basehub.com/191e7e6d/a8f31b5eade8c4a868b8831955ea455c/frontier-black.webp)](https://www.cursor.com/features)
*   [### Feels Familiar Import all your extensions, themes, and keybindings in one click. ![Image 8](https://assets.basehub.com/191e7e6d/9ae60e2d1008e3cc1c372e2cbf85c856/familiar-black.webp)](https://www.cursor.com/features)
*   [### Privacy Options If you enable Privacy Mode, your code is never stored remotely. Cursor is SOC 2 certified. ![Image 9](https://assets.basehub.com/191e7e6d/30c4a4dc68ffbaa1f12dbf3a7b348931/sec-black-(0-00-00-00).webp)](https://www.cursor.com/features)

*   [### Frontier Intelligence Powered by a mix of purpose-built and frontier models, Cursor is smart and fast. ![Image 10](https://assets.basehub.com/191e7e6d/a8f31b5eade8c4a868b8831955ea455c/frontier-black.webp)](https://www.cursor.com/features)
*   [### Feels Familiar Import all your extensions, themes, and keybindings in one click. ![Image 11](https://assets.basehub.com/191e7e6d/9ae60e2d1008e3cc1c372e2cbf85c856/familiar-black.webp)](https://www.cursor.com/features)
*   [### Privacy Options If you enable Privacy Mode, your code is never stored remotely. Cursor is SOC 2 certified. ![Image 12](https://assets.basehub.com/191e7e6d/30c4a4dc68ffbaa1f12dbf3a7b348931/sec-black-(0-00-00-00).webp)](https://www.cursor.com/features)

[Blog ![Image 13](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbg-compress.28e9667b.webp&w=3840&q=75) Blog Iterating with Shadow Workspaces -------------------------------- Hidden windows and kernel-level folder proxies to let AIs iterate on code without affecting the user. Keep Reading ![Image 14: Arvid](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=%2Fauthors%2Farvid.jpeg&w=3840&q=75) Posted by Arvid 19 minutes read](https://www.cursor.com/blog/shadow-workspace)

Loved by world-class devs
-------------------------

Engineers all around the world reach for Cursor by choice.

Cursor is at least a 2x improvement over Copilot. It's amazing having an AI pair programmer, and is an incredible accelerator for me and my team.

![Image 15: Ben Bernard](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.basehub.com%2F191e7e6d%2Fbacbbb589ac2e0ed1bff2c7fc5678fff%2Fbenb-copy.jpeg&w=384&q=75)

Ben Bernard

Instacart

The Cursor tab completion while coding is occasionally so magic it defies reality - about ~25% of the time it is anticipating exactly what I want to do. It is enough to make you believe that eventually you'll be able to code at the speed of thought.

![Image 16: Kevin Whinnery](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.basehub.com%2F191e7e6d%2F050df60ab6abfd3eb84b45f2de92017b%2Ftzdi-krg400x400.jpg&w=384&q=75)

Kevin Whinnery

OpenAI

Cursor is hands down my biggest workflow improvement in years

![Image 17: Sawyer Hood](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.basehub.com%2F191e7e6d%2Ff09b26d29b76bac95b566420ed98eebe%2F7k6yh27k400x400.jpg&w=384&q=75)

Sawyer Hood

Figma

I love writing code and Cursor is a necessity. Cursor is steps ahead of my brain, proposing multi-line edits so I type ‚Äútab‚Äù more than anything else.

![Image 18: Andrew Milich](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.basehub.com%2F191e7e6d%2Fe296543be66f6e9fc6e46523a8c07293%2F440fe5d8f1aab84902daf6a84937e915b06ec117-684x684.png&w=384&q=75)

Andrew Milich

Notion

Cursor is so good, and literally gets better/more feature-rich every couple of weeks.

![Image 19: Morgan McGuire](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.basehub.com%2F191e7e6d%2F44bebc63b4051216803d29e68584ed93%2Fmorgan-copy.jpg&w=384&q=75)

Morgan McGuire

Weights & Biases

Cursor is awesome! Someone finally put GPT into a code editor in a seamless way. It's so elegant and easy. No more copying and pasting. I'm an hour in and already hooked.

![Image 20: Andrew McCalip](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.basehub.com%2F191e7e6d%2F2496ef0d1a9f80230e094bd27774a2ba%2Fandrew-(1).jpg&w=384&q=75)

Andrew McCalip

Varda

Cursor is the best AI developer tool right now, avoid it at your own peril

![Image 21: Logan Kilpatrick](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.basehub.com%2F191e7e6d%2Fa59c77974e57c397895f05bbb03435b9%2Fyhl9ubk0400x400.jpg&w=384&q=75)

Logan Kilpatrick

Google

Started using Cursor yesterday & i'm blown away. it's how Copilot should feel. i'm completely off VSCode now.

![Image 22: Sam Whitmore](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.basehub.com%2F191e7e6d%2Fae5c0f6564b08bbe348f9f159172a2f7%2Fsam-copy.jpeg&w=384&q=75)

Sam Whitmore

New Computer

Cursor is the best product I've used in a while - it's an AI enabled editor. I just asked it to write a README for a project I've been working on - analyzed the code-base and worked first time.

![Image 23: Alex MacCaw](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.basehub.com%2F191e7e6d%2Ff2d565bcb77ec05f36359266c49e77d8%2Fmccaw2-copy.jpeg&w=384&q=75)

Alex MacCaw

Reflect

Cursor is the best product I've used in a while - it's an AI enabled editor. I just asked it to write a README for a project I've been working on - analyzed the code-base and worked first time.

![Image 24: Zeke Sikelianos](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.basehub.com%2F191e7e6d%2Fbc6af54399b82fab3cf63f222ffa59ea%2Fzeke2-copy.jpeg&w=384&q=75)

Zeke Sikelianos

Replicate

Gonna apply to YC and list Cursor as my cofounder

![Image 25: Cory Etzkorn](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.basehub.com%2F191e7e6d%2F051968b0beaddbac21d296e67bac30c9%2Fcory-etzkorn-square-2023.jpg&w=384&q=75)

Cory Etzkorn

Notion

Cursor's new auto-complete is insane You no longer need to prompt it. It predicts what code you want based on what you're doing. Accept by hitting tab In this video I change the CSS class of one link. I then simply keep hitting tab to make the same change to all other links

![Image 26: Marc K√∂hlbrugge](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.basehub.com%2F191e7e6d%2F56e05e14af25416f9fdda0e0be696dc2%2F53b183b260689e496b434ab1-11828ab0fee617c2fba3829910cda904.jpeg&w=384&q=75)

Marc K√∂hlbrugge

WIP

I really like how Cursor suggests edits to existing code. It noticed I was inconsistent with my markup and popped up this suggestion that matched my other items!

![Image 27: Wes Bos](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.basehub.com%2F191e7e6d%2Fcec1d60f81af24e8e0b39ac1355bd6fa%2Fwes.jpg&w=384&q=75)

Wes Bos

Internet

Cursor is üêê-ed for real

![Image 28: Steven Tey](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.basehub.com%2F191e7e6d%2F0b78a17b431cc2038cd6f9fe1316741a%2Fsteven.jpg&w=384&q=75)

Steven Tey

Dub

I really like how Cursor suggests edits to existing code. It noticed I was inconsistent with my markup and popped up this suggestion that matched my other items!

![Image 29: Wes Bos](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.basehub.com%2F191e7e6d%2Fcec1d60f81af24e8e0b39ac1355bd6fa%2Fwes.jpg&w=384&q=75)

Wes Bos

Internet

The most useful AI tool that I currently pay for is, hands down, is Cursor It's fast, autocompletes when and where you need it to, handles brackets properly, sensible keyboard shortcuts, bring- your-own-model...everything is well put together.

![Image 30: shadcn](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.basehub.com%2F191e7e6d%2Fe941f86e0ca2b1c9eefd47618a920404%2Ftuyae5z7400x400.jpg&w=384&q=75)

shadcn

Vercel

I went from never hearing about Cursor to many IC engineers telling me it‚Äôs their new favorite tool. Seemingly overnight! Pretty wild product-market fit.

![Image 31: Josh Miller](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.basehub.com%2F191e7e6d%2F1378a2f2a9ea7a061b2f6ac213678111%2Fjosh.jpg&w=384&q=75)

Josh Miller

The Browser Company

I installed Cursor ... oh

![Image 32: Kent C. Dodds](https://www.cursor.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.basehub.com%2F191e7e6d%2Fc616f8d9766003b1bbae8d905945a9e1%2Fkent.jpg&w=384&q=75)

Kent C. Dodds

Internet

After many recommendations, I finally switched from VSC to Cursor and ... wow! It's absolutely incredible. If you like Copilot (or if you don't), you'll be blown away by Cursor. There is no going back. ü§Ø
